dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OOF!

dialogues.text: I'm sorry, senor.

Suddenly- -a PAIR OF WHITE EYES open in the blackness behind him! n a quick series of shots we see Pantera getting the raw of a flurry of fist and foot attacks. His attacker is mov way too fast for the camera to keep up. Pantera falls back, panting heavily. Panicked. He tears o into the dense Jungle! ON PANTERA RUNNING THROUGH JUNGLE - Thick foliage. Panick

The Jeep flies out of jungle and bounce-slows into the FG! Only there is no one driving it... and it still has the stolen food in it. And the stolen medallion dangles from rear view mirror.

dialogues.text: It's a miracle!

dialogues.text: The village rejoices. The Boy steps aside for a beat, loo back at the Jungle. Something catches his eye. ...a small crouched figure on a tree branch. Barely silhouetted. His white eyes lit in the darkness. One of t WINKS as the boy smiles.

Driver doesn't notice as - THWIP-IP-IP! - he hu the knife at the Driver! THUNK! It sticks in the DRIVER'S BACK! N MUGGER - His grinning eyes suddenly GO WIDE as Driver slowly turns around, UNHURT! The Mugger is trapped as Dri moves toward him... and a BOLO CHAIN drops to his side. ON WALL SHADOW - as we see a flurry of punches, kicks and throws as Driver lays a beating on the criminal who needs be taught a lesson. An OS Police Siren chirps. dialogues.text: 15 Mikey opens the van's rear doors. He PULLS OFF the fake zipper on his chest and then pulls off his fake turtle he His trademark orange bandana spills out. He turns, breathing in the fresh surface air. A quiet bea until - A POLICE SIREN approaches, faint, in the distance Mikey jumps in the van, slams the door shut as the car whizzes by. WIDER - the van takes off down the street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, hey, hey... don't forget the face thing.

He's behind the wheel - face FROZEN in a goofy SMILE like a ventriloquist to "hide" his identity. Don follows on a sm surveillance cam under the rearview mirror.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes... sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's a good boy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All's I'm saying Donnie is that no one would notice if YOU did one of these gigs every now and again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But you add such... panache to the character.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mikey, emotional, pops into "fully animated" facial mode. rubs his sore neck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, if panache is French for "punching bag", I'd have to agree with ya.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 17 A darkened room lit only by the lights of dozens of tv's, monitors and TV tubes. Cables run everywhere. In front of them is DONATELLO - our resident tech-head turtle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Close enough. I - uh-oh-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -you got a peeping tom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aw nuts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Traffic's clear eastbound for two blocks. Then hook up with route J.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BACK WITH MIKEY - He's still waving with a frozen smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (ventriloquist style) Righteous.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mikey immediately "unfreezes" and sticks his tongue out a antics at the Man! Before the man can react, Mikey TEARS and zips across traffic down a deserted side-street. ...as we notice the annoying ice cream style music tinker

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: along with his gaining speed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You HAD to install the music too...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All part of the cover, my friend.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: YEEEEEHAAAAAAWWWW!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But this isn't just any half-pipe - it tests all of Mikey skills in ninjitsu, extreme sports and cross-training. He jumps on and off the board to occasionally tackle obstacl with all four limbs. A fun rock n' roll sequence. Feels like Mikey is miles away from the surface world whe arrives at a seemingly DEAD END. He smiles as he reveals BRICK DUMMY WALL that brings him to...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Honeeeeey! I'm hooome!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Mikey slides down the banister, the cam dollies around

dialogues.speaker: I
dialogues.text: behind him revealing the LAIR. Breathtaking to fresh eyes t has a wonderful lived-in feel - they're not squatters.. they've made this their HOME. Furniture is jury-rigged an the place is custom lit to provide the right kind of atmosphere. If we looked behind the surface detail, we'd a mesh of wires and circuitry powering the entire lair. Donatello runs up to Mikey. Mikey robotically hands him t wad of money from the party.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Moneymoneymoneymoney.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Donnie walks away, Mikey LOUDLY CLEARS HIS THROAT. Don stops as Mikey holds out his hand. Don's busted - he peel off a few bills and hands Mikey his share.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Domo arigato, dude.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mikey walks into the room and plops down on a sofa. Hits remote as a BIG SCREEN lights up in front of him. Suddenl

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MICHAELANGELO!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mikey springs from the couch. Snaps to obedience.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, sensei.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANGLE ON - SPLINTER the Japanese rodent master and father the TMNT. He is well-kempt, still walks with a cane, and the same sparkle in his eye. He approaches Mikey. Silent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (a beat) Well?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sensei? (thinks, then realizes) Oh! Here ya go, Master Splinter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mikey reaches into his bag and removes a foil-wrapped pie of BIRTHDAY CAKE. Splinter lights up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ahh! Butter creme frosting!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Donatello walks to Splinter. Holds his hand out, judgment

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master. No cake. You remember your last cholesterol tests.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But I- (changes attitude) -Donatello! I am your Master!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nice try, sensei. But you can still be my Master... with low cholesterol.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Splinter surrenders the cake. As Don walks away, Michaelangelo reaches into his bag and secretly passes Splinter a smaller wrapped piece.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He-heh. You have done well, my son.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Donatello walks to the fridge and opens it - FILLED with dozens of other pieces of Birthday Cake leftovers. He tos it with the rest.                                  C

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 22 The street noise below is barely audible. Camera creeps a the edge of the building, reaching a row of GARGOYLES. AN ALONG GARGOYLES - Still. Concrete. Creepy. Just as we pass the fourth, we barely notice it's WHITE EYES OPENING QUICK SNAP BACK TO GARGOYLE - Only now it's gone. Somethi strange is coming to town...

dialogues.text: Large freighters. Lots of activity. PUSH IN on a steamer crane lowers a LARGE VERTICAL CRATE to the dock - it THUM down hard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Careful! That isn't some box full of fish!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CAM LOWERS - as APRIL O'NEIL leaps down into frame. Dress in jungle expedition gear with her head wrapped in a band She takes off her sunglasses and admires the crate. ON BOX - Labelled "O'Neil Cargo". Something ominous about crate. PUSH IN on it as April steps in front. Admires it pride. Turns, takes out a cell phone, and hits speed dial ON PHONE DISPLAY - "Calling HOME". It rings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (impatient mutter) Where are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 24 A spacious NYC loft - tons of bookcases work as room dividers. Piled with artifacts, unopened crates of all si boxes of maps, and a general organized mess. A hockey gam BLARES from a TV set. CAM PANS ACROSS ROOM - The telephone continues to ring ju as we reach the KITCHEN - with piles of dirty dishes and food. And then a path of strewn clothes that gets messier messier until we reach - - CASEY JONES, snoring on a sofa. He finally wakes up, clamors for the phone, tripping over mess in the process.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Talk to me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey. It's me. I'm back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Casey rubs his face, tries to orient himself. Looks at wa

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Was that today, babe?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: April's disappointed. Same old Casey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. It was today that I returned to you after being in a deadly jungle for almost a month.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought you were going to meet me down here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry, babe. I must've-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Forget it. I'll take a cab.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A long pause on the phone. Casey knows he's busted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I missed you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: April doesn't answer. She closes the phone. Casey slumps his chair, shaking his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good goin', Case.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back at the dock, April is back to business.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Howie! Get this on the truck for delivery! Let's go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: P.O.V. INSIDE BOX - See April through the wood slats. We' swear we almost hear... LOW GROWLING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 25 Mikey is on his bed. His thumbs pound away at a video gam TV - bored. He puts down the controller and yells to the ceiling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'M! BORED!!!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He stands up and walks to DON'S ROOM. He opens it. It tak only one foot until the door is pushed up against piles o TECH JUNK. Mikey uses his shoulder and pushes it open. N DON - He's hunched over a work table, back to Mikey. Tinkering as always. Wild inventions line the walls, some finished, some not. Some pay tribute to past TMNT adventu

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don, y'ever feel like you were meant for more? To DO more? Like, I mean, sometimes I feel like...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MICHAELANGELO(cont'd) like we never really left that glass turtle bowl when we were little dudes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: REVERSE ANGLE - Don lifts his head up, eyes MAGNIFIED in bizarre head contraption. He flips up side panels, ELECTRONICA MUSIC blares out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, hi Mikey. You say something?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sighs - to himself) Every day it's the same thing. Wake up. Birthday party gig. Drive home. Watch TV. Train... Rinse. Repeat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know. Isn't it great?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A beat. Mikey sighs, then walks back downstairs to the LI ROOM SOFA. He and the camera think he's alone, but before knows it, Splinter is sitting next to him, cross legged, still, and sipping tea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WAH!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Michaelangelo. Boredom is never an indicator of your surroundings. It is a reflection of your inner heart. Fill yourself with excitement on the inside... and you'll live the most rewarding life of all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mikey stares at Splinter, dead pan. A beat. Then returns flipping channels. He stops on a NEWS program - "NYC DIRT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And so yet again, police officials are baffled at a crime of retribution that can only be attributed to the mysterious figure

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: M         known as "The Nightwatcher". ikey lights up. On TV is a flashy well-coifed, know-nothi REPORTER. Beside him is a news photo of the tied up MUGGE from our second scene.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is the latest in a string of vigilante acts that have been plaguing the city for the past year.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NYC DIRT REPORTER(cont'd) Although the victims have been criminals themselves, the Nightwatcher's actions have been identified as destructive and overly-violent... verging on the edge of lethal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON MIKEY - Can't smile wide enough. He runs to his room, returns with a POLAROID CAMERA. He snaps a picture of the He pulls it out, placing it in his NIGHTWATCHER SCRAPBOOK overflowing with paper clippings and articles on the vigilante.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now THAT'S what I'm talking about! Cruising the streets, busting those who hold themselves above the law. (movie announcer voice) But they aren't above HIS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don walks in, holding an in-process invention. He looks u

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mikey, the man's practically a criminal himself. Anyone who operates without boundary or rule of law cannot be legislated and needs to be reigned in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sounds like four turtles I used ta know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON DOOR - Raphael walks in, his Nightwatcher costume no w in sight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whatta we talkin' about, boys? Soundin' a little too egghead fer my tastes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah, Raphael. Your brothers and I were just discussing the vigilante Nightwatcher once again. (beat - concerned) Where have you been? You've been spending so much time away from home lately...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raphael's on edge from the mention of Nightwatcher alread His attention doesn't break from Donatello.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I joined a book a' the month club. (to Donnie) So just what's your beef with puttin' dirtbags behind bars, Donnie? Go ahead... enlighten me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Splinter watches the growing tension with concern.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have no problem with the incarceration of those who deserve it, but if someone like Nightwatcher has ultimate power... then who makes sure he doesn't cross the line?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mikey picks up two NINJA BLADE RINGS, twirling them aroun aggressively in mock battle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think he's COOL.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course you would.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in bg, oblivious) Keeya! HATCHAAAAAA!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sometimes there are lines that even the police can't cross. Someone has to be willing to do what needs to be done. And to do that, fear becomes a weapon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are such a Neanderthal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raphael does the bully FAKE LUNGE at Don. Don reacts quic and startled, eyes wide.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I rest my case.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (SCOLDING) Raphael! If bullying is the only way to argue your point, then perhaps you do not have much of a point to begin with.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (gritted teeth) Yes, sensei. (to Mikey) And quit touchin' my stuff.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raph yanks the Ring Blades out of Mikey's hands and storm out of the room by flipping up a series of cables to the second floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (too-late-retort to Raph) That was just a startle response and isn't really an indication of fear!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raph does the "blah blah" hand gesture from above. Enters room, slams the door and immediately BLASTS MUSIC... ...and it's some annoying pop HIP-HOP song.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AAAARGH! AND STOP TOUCHING MY STEREO TOO, MIKEY!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then HEAVY ROCK starts playing to drown out his family. A silence sits in the room as a CD flies out of Raph's room Tense in the room for a bit. Don looks at the other two.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's an involuntary thing your body does when stimulated like that. (no response) What? It's true.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 26 A large JET LINER flies into the city. Lowering. The whee fold out under the carriages. CLOSER - LEO is on the landing gear, his face lit up by t city glow in front of him. He jumps off as - FOOMP! - a H GLIDER opens up from his backpack. He lowers the glider t the water and RELEASES!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 27 Disgusting. Dripping. Out of the slime, Leo rises. A beat inhales, then SMILES WIDE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mmm... home sweet home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 28 All is peaceful in the lair. The big screen TV is the onl light source. Mikey snores and drools on the couch, cover in junk food wrappers. Donnie sleeps with an "TECH HEAD" magazine over his face... gadget-in-process in his lap. ON ENTRANCE - Leo walks in and places his bag on the floo The place feels different... but still feels like home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He tiptoes with ninjitsu precision across the floor, avoi the potential noise-making mess below him. He sneaks to-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 29 Leo peers in cautiously. Splinter is still awake. Expecti him. Kneeling on the floor. Very serious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Enter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leo walks in and kneels in front of Splinter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have completed my training, master. I am prepared for the next stage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That you are, my son. You must now apply all that you have learned on your lengthy journey to your everyday life. THAT will be the most challenging training of all...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: plinter reaches out and hands Leonardo an ANCIENT MEDALLI Leo is touched. CLOSE ON SHADOWS OUTSIDE OF ROOM - We see a pair of EYES, watching the entire scene... jealous.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've missed you, Leonardo.

dialogues.speaker: L
dialogues.text: eo hugs Splinter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've missed you too, father.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm afraid much has changed in your brothers' spirits since you have left. But now that you are home, they will finally have the ethical and warrior leadership they have been lacking. The family needs you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON LEO - He swallows that big pill very hard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Heh. Yeah... I mean, yes sensei.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to doorway) Raphael, your brother is home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON OUTSIDE OF ROOM - Raphael walks out of the shadows. He good... but not too good for Splinter. Splinter and Leo b and face the doorway. An awkward silence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raphael eyes Leo... and then the medallion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So... congratulations.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (awkward beat/fake yawn) Well, I'm goin' to bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He leaves. TV ROOM - Raph walks through the room, cuffs Don on the b of the head, and keeps on walking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leo's home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Donatello wakes up, looks around. LIGHTS UP when he sees

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leo!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON MIKEY - He wakes up. A Cheese Doodle stuck to his uppe snout. Really groggy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But I don't WANNA pop out of the birthday cake, Mrs. Ro- (snaps out of it) LEOOOOO!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mikey flips past Donnie and slams Leo with a gripping HUG and doesn't let go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey little bro! a beat) Mikey? You can let go now... um, Mikey?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (MUTTERING) So bored... so bored...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VER BLACK - Quick bursts of AUDIO VIOLENCE. Steel, screaming, trampling, and rumbling. Then- -with each audio burst, we now see a VISUAL BURST. Strong rim-lit, iconic images of an IMMENSE BATTLE - a slicing b weapon, screaming mouth, angry eyes. Then- -a monster claw! Gnashing teeth! Scared eyes! Horns and tusks! The edit gets intense, until -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AAAAAAAAAAAAGGGH!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 30 It was all a nightmare. We go WIDER as we take in the ostentatious bedroom of MAXIMILIAN WINTERS, a young mid-4 Famous NYC entrepreneur. inters is large, handsome, built and powerful in every sense. His bedroom reflects it as well - large simple sha decorated with a modern-day tribal/tech appeal. This guy filled with adrenaline, power and machismo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Winters, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON DOORWAY - Standing there is a beautiful black-haired assistant dressed in full suit and tie with a clipboard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's time for your morning workout.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 31 Rock/hip-hop music crashes in as we see Winters' morning workout - a combination of weaponry work (martial arts an others), floor routines and bag work. He takes it all ver seriously. Sequence ends with him smashing the top off of a Mook Jun training block with his bare fist. He walks out of the ro grabbing a towel from a blonde assistant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 32 Winters walks in his crisp suit. His office is large and austere. Two levels of history in books, artifacts, warri themed curios and power.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Winters, sir?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON DOOR - His Assistant stands at the large doors.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The board is waiting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Excellent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He walks to the large bay windows that overlooks the city

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 33 Now outside the window, he smiles at the view.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell them I'm on my way down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He slowly LOWERS OUT OF FRAME. CAM PULLS OUT WIDER REVEAL Winters Office is an "elevator" of sorts that can ride up and down the front of the building, allowing him access t any floor of his Tower without leaving his desk. WIDER - see the Tower is a monolith in the middle of Manhattan - complete with it's own front Central Park-ish gated entry. A true work of modern architecture.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 34 We see the wonder of everything Winters - mixing of old artifacts with modern day aesthetic and implementation. T ceilings are vast and there is no mistaking the worth of man and his company.

dialogues.speaker: W
dialogues.text: inters' Elevator Office lowers into a balcony level build overseeing the main lobby. He walks down a stairwell and through the lobby, five Assistants following him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 35 Winters walks in the room. CLOSE ON him as he stops at th head of the boardroom table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gentlemen! Let's begin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CAM PULLS BACK along the impossibly long table as DOZENS BOARD MEMBERS stand up. When it reaches the end, it looks though Winters stands at the head of an ARMY AT ATTENTION

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leo walks along the upper floor of their lair. As he pass Mikey's room, his brother pops out with his skateboard. W follow them as they walk down to the TV area.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leo... what's up, bro?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just enjoying being home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: hey walk past Donnie's Chop Shop room as - BOOM! - someth explodes and smoke pours out under his door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NOBODY PANIC! I HAVE IT ALL UNDER CONTROL!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mikey and Leo COUGH, leave the smokey area.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Say, what's up with April and Casey? I expected them to drop by after I got back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We don't see much of `em anymore. April seems to be working a lot - eww - and Casey seems to be, I dunno, "different" lately. Maybe he doesn't like having to put the toilet seat down now that they've moved in together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're living together now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They get to the living room area. Mikey walks to the edge a jury-rigged HALF-PIPE he built in an old water slough. Mikey continues as he skates back and forth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To be honest with ya, they're kinda buzzkills to be around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is Casey at least still doing his hockey mask thing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dunno. Haven't noticed since The Nightwatcher has come home to roost. WOOOOHOOOOOOOO!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Nightwatcher"? That some new comic book you're hooked on, Mikey?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RAPHAEL walks in. Picks up Mikey's scrapbook as he passes sofa and slugs it in Leo's chest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This should explain most of it. The legacy of the city's newest hero. Compliments of the fanboy over there.    M

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Joke all you want, Raphy. But train hard and eat your veggies and one day, you too can be as cool as The Nightwatcher, dude.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can only hope, Mikey. I can only hope...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leo disapprovingly flips through the book.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This guy could bring heat on all of us if he keeps this up. Showboating isn't a replacement for justice... it's just self-indulgence. (looks back at book) Someone needs to talk to this thug.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON RAPH - He looks... dying to say something. But can't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 37 CLOSE ON - A familiar-looking white HOCKEY MASK. Eyes bli behind it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yo, Case? Wanna be goalie?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The mask is pushed aside by Casey - Kid 1 was holding it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nah, you know I work for a livin'. It's Star Center or nothin' else.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WIDER - Casey is with 5 other KIDS prepping for a game of STREET HOCKEY, using tennis balls and trash cans. Chubbie KID 2 walks by and grabs the mask himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whatever! Let's get it on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They begin a boisterous round of hockey. Trash talk, gent checking and all the requisite boy things. We see that th kids love Casey. And vice versa. Suddenly-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TOMMY!! IT'S TIME FOR DINNER!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BUT MA! WE JUST STARTED!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (snapping back) THOMAS!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tommy's defeated. Looks at the disappointed boys.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry dudes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Busted! Have fun with your mommy... (face falls, disappointed) ...oh no.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OFF HIS LOOK - We see APRIL, dressed stunning in a dark business suit at the other side of the street. She's dang a WHITE SHIRT and a TIE from her other hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aw, c'mon April! We just started!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: April just gives him "the look" with an eyebrow cock. Cas knows he can't win.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can't Casey stay and play for just five more minutes, Miss O'Neil? Pleeeeeeease?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not today, Nate. Mister Jones has to pretend to be an adult for a few hours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Awwwww! Man! Baaah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Casey hands his stick, then quickly turns with a grin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Later boys!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CAM FOLLOWS April and Casey as they walk down the street. April's not really a hard-ass - she's just forced to be t "responsible one" in A the relationship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need your help with a delivery.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Arnold voice) Do you need my funtahstick muscles?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Heh-heh... yeah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Casey awkwardly places his arm over her shoulder as the c rests and they walk into the distance. He pulls it back d CAM ANGLES ON WALL - As we notice CLAW MARKS sliced into concrete exterior of a building.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 38 The doors open in Winters Lobby. April struts in, owning place. Casey struggles pulling the pallet holding the LAR CRATE behind them. As she passes reception-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Winters. April O'Neil is here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His darkened office is especially alpha-male - BIG GAME H trophies adorn the walls, as do SUITS OF ARMOR from all t periods and random strange ARTIFACTS spanning history in glass cases. Winters sits at his large desk as the large doors open an April and Casey spill in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miss O'Neil. You are a vision. Thirty days in a jungle, and beautiful as ever.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He shakes her hand and double-cheek kisses her. Casey's e widen - is THIS what his girlfriend does?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello Max.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is my... friend, Casey Jones.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chris! How's it going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winters nearly crushes Casey's hand in his grip.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Actually, It's Ca-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (ignoring, back to April) So how was your trip?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know, the typical - corrupt government officials, double crossed by a jungle guide, all ending in a heart-pounding chase.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winters and April chuckle. Cam adjusts to show Casey betw them in the bg, looking uncomfortable and out of place.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But it was all worth it. beat - excited) I found it. The fourth General.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winters BEAMS, way too excited as well. April holds out h hand to Casey, who doesn't know what she wants. He awkwar HIGH FIVES her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah-ha! The fourth General.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (hushed gritted teeth) The crow-bar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He hands it to April as she twirls up a CROW-BAR and crac open the front panel. INSIDE BOX POV - The light gradually breaks in, until - C - the front panel falls to the floor. CLOSE ON - Winters' look. Pure wonder and admiration. He walks up to it slowly. April and Casey cautiously stay ba

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (SOFT) ...the gods be praised.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON BOX - We finally see the statue - GENERAL AGUILA - a s foot towering wall of granite and obsidian. Eagle warrior armor reflecting a South American design... though not fr specific time period. Winters rubs his hand over the ston

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can I ask you a question?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (not looking away) Y es. Of course.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've been so grateful for the opportunities you've given me lately. I'd probably be still selling antique curios if you hadn't visited my shop that day. (off of box) But I have to ask... why the fascination with these particular works of art? I'd never even heard of the Legend of Yaotl until we met.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks up. The cam PANS RIGHT. It travels past an SUIT ARMOR in the FG. Goes to BLACK. Continue PAN until we're

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -the armor becomes the back of a HELMET. Camera dollies around the helmet until we're looking at a dark and impos figure. YAOTL. His helmet is impenetrable, with eye slits Note - the flashback is dark, shadowed and monochromed. Detail is hinted at instead of shown. Very stylized.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was a time long before the Mayans, April. Long before the Aztecs and even the Olmecs. It was a time of legends. A time of greatness. The true mother culture of Central America.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cool shots of Yaotl. His armor, his stance, etc.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There was a man named Yaotl. More a force of nature than man. And together with his Four Warrior- Priest Generals, they pillaged every culture in their path.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: QUICK SHOTS OF EACH GENERAL. The walk along side Yoatl. Possibly slo-mo. We will come to recognize them through t distinct armor as the Four Stone Generals - in human form

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And for every culture they destroyed, they drank in all the magic and knowledge known to them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WINTERS(cont'd) They became a warring hurricane, gathering more power and knowledge with each conquest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: GROUP SHOT - Of five Warriors. High atop a hillside, fina stopped. Ready for battle. Their character-specific weapo are drawn. Around them is a small army of MINIONS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then they came across a culture rich with science, magic and their own technology. A South American version of "Atlantis". ( BEAT) It was like blood in the water for a predator like Yaotl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON - Yaotl. As he raises his sword in the air. CAM DOLLIES AROUND HIS HEAD REVEALING their opposing forces. army of THOUSANDS. Waving their weapons in the air. The opposing army CHARGES. Yaotl's men pull out   a large ORNAMENTAL STAND - a "stargate" of sorts. Yaotl   and his are unmoving... as they begin a ceremony. Yaotl   looks t heavens above - as we see a CLUSTER OF SPECIFIC   STARS m into place.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the army approached, Yaotl used the knowledge they'd gained in black magic and sorcery. Timing their attack with the alignment of the Stars of Kikin, they opened a portal to another world.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON CHARGING ARMY - they stop dead in their tracks. Front- by the OS portal. Don't know what to expect - ON PORTAL - A crackling electric circle opens to another dimension. Suddenly - DOZENS OF MONSTERS EXPLODE OUT! Creatures of all varieties. Gnashing Fangs. Swiping claws

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They unleashed an army of monsters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: N BATTLEFIELD - men getting slaughtered (in a nice PG sor of way). Quick shots. Intense.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The monsters knew no side   - they destroyed the enemy... as   well as Yaotl's own army. Men who   swore to spill their blood for his   cause. Yaotl had to do something   to stop more from coming through.

dialogues.speaker: W
dialogues.text: inters SMASHES the portal, stopping the slew of monsters from pouring out. End on a scream. Dissolve to LATER in t battle...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Desolate, destroyed battlefield. Smoldering. Bodies everywhere. No monsters. End pan on Yaotl on his knees.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the end, there were no victors. And they were responsible for the eradication of the greatest culture that will never be known. The knowledge that was lost would never be found again...

dialogues.speaker: DISSOLVE BACK TO PRESENT DAY IN WINTERS' OFFICE
dialogues.text: Casey has fallen asleep, sitting to the side, head in his hand. A line of DROOL hangs from his mouth. April is fascinated by the story. She nudges Casey who does the slurp/half-snore wake up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ("wake up" fast speak) I was just resting my eyes...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quite the story, Max. concerned re: Statue) You don't think that this could be-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh no, Miss O'Neil. looks back to statue) Like you said... just a story.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: inters doesn't break his stare.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of the girls will pay your fee on the way out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks. Um... goodbye... Max.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: April and Casey leave Winters, consumed with his new treasure. He doesn't reply.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 41 April and Casey walk the lobby. She shoots him "the look"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What!? It was a boring story!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That is so perfectly CASEY JONES. I give you opportunity. I give you the chance to become a better man. And what do you do with it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: APRIL(cont'd)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: YOU FALL ASLEEP!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Casey stops next to a PODIUM holding a priceless-looking VASE. As he speaks, he gestures very animatedly and dangerously close to the vase.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, maybe if you were home for more than four days at a time, you'd see that I DON'T WANT ANY OF THIS!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sees danger of vase) Casey, you better be careful-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here I am nice enough to help you out, dress in this get-up and all I get is grief?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...as he knocks and SMASHES the vase to the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh boy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Klaxons sound as SHINK-SHINK-SHINK - METAL PLATES SLAM DO

dialogues.speaker: OVER THE GLASS ENTRY. COMPLETELY ENCLOSES THE FRONT LOBBY
dialogues.text: Room is now emergency light RED. April rubs her temples.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give me strength.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 42 Winters is still alone in his office. Still studying the statue. A beat. He turns his head to the side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can come out now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: IDER - As we see FOUR FIGURES appear out of the smallest darkest of shadows! The LEADER slinks forward - clearly a

dialogues.speaker: S
dialogues.text: woman - dressed in cloak and Japanese Noh mask over her f he takes it off, revealing KARAI - the beautiful leader o the Japanese Foot Clan, flanked by three, FOOT NINJAS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your talents are commendable.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As are yours. Most don't notice us until we decide they will.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, I guess I'm just special that way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winters walks over to his desk. The Statue looms behind t

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So down to business - aside from the other reasons for your visit to America, are you interested in my offer we discussed?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I must confess... I still don't know exactly what we are to do for you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need the finely-tuned eyes and stealth of your Foot Ninja to... monitor the city for me over the next few days.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winters walks to his window. It's night. Overlooks the ci

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just keep your eyes peeled for anything... strange.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (long beat) What kind of strange things?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The question hangs as we PUSH IN ON Statue's face... his eerie eyes. We think his eye GLOWS, only we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 43 The glowing eye is really a STAR. The same line pattern w saw at movie's open. The stars ADJUST... lining up in a m straight-lined manner. CAM LOWERS, placing us back in-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 44 A MAN walks down the sidewalk. As he passes a DARKENED ALLEYWAY, he hears a low GROWL come from it. He stops. ALLEY POV - As the man looks in. Can't see a thing. Hand- cam. He moves to leave... and the growl comes again. STREET - Man stares in. No one on the street. Looks close closer... grows more tense as...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...WHAM! The requisite CAT jumps out of the shadows. Scar Man half to death.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WAAAAAAAAAAHHH!!!! (calms down) Gave me a scare kitty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pets the kitty a bit, then walks off. CAM LOWERS behin cat, as Man walks off into the distance. Until... ...WHAM! A large burly CLAWED ARM slams out of the shadow onto the cat, yanking it back into the alley! Quick caterwaul. Silence. And then we hear a BURP.

dialogues.speaker: C
dialogues.text: AM LOWERS further through the asphalt, then quickly hooks with an air duct pipe. Zips faster and faster until we're

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leo feverishly works out. He stops, looking up, panting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Does ANYBODY train anymore?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just a sec, dude! I'm almost at level eighteen. (OS video game explosion) Scratch that... seventeen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DONNAY!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In... uh... a few minutes, Leo. I'm in the middle of-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KZZZT-BOOOM! - An OS invention blows up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Um... make that another hour.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leo sighs. Splinter walks by, not stopping.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A true leader knows how to motivate his troops regardless of their own motivations.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Splinter walks past a large FUSE BOX. Leo thinks a beat. smiles. WIDE SHOT OF LAIR MAIN ROOM as - KACHUNK! - the entire ro goes BLACK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aw man! What's goin' on?! WHO TURNED OUT THE LIGHTS!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ninja tag, topside!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another place that isn't the TMNT lair. Dark and mysterio Don't know where we are. Feels ceremonial. We see close u detail of statue GRANITE. A DEEP VOICE chants OS in a South American tongue as HIGH TECH GEAR is placed on the rock. It becomes powered, triggering a reaction in the stone itself. Music builds as we see quick shots of the granite cracks GLOWING RED. Camera travels with the rising glow. End on a pair of DEAD EYES - suddenly come to life. Red g

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 47 The boys stand high atop the city below. Readying to run gauntlet of rooftop hazards. They spy a BILLBOARD off in distance.            M

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: First one to touch old faithful over there-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -does the other team's chores for a week.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leo and Raph glare at each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm with Leo!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Actually, I think you and I should pair up, Mikey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You kiddin' me?! I mean, no offense Donnie, but you ain't exactly the biggest hitter on the bench.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don is grinning. Observing the subtle tension.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just trust me on this one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Music builds to a fun number as the two teams run paralle buildings. The course requires them to work as a TEAM, throwing, catching and propelling one another from obstac to obstacle. Leo accidentally slips, PLOWING Raph face-first into a br wall. Raph, convinced Leo did it on purpose, uses his nex opportunity to hurl Leo dangerously high and far over a billboard. The situation escalates at each juncture.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have you been avoiding me? Barely seen you since I got home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I been busy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (SARCASTIC) I see. So... you're definitely not upset at me or anything, right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why'd you think that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know... your brother gets to go on a world-wide training mission and you have to stay home. Might upset me too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you trying to make me mad?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm just saying, I'd understand if you were upset.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Their intensity ESCALATES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You wouldn't understand the first thing about me, daddy's boy - OOF!.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: hey both trip over a duct, tumbling in a ball. They stop rolling, continue fighting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is that what this is about? You think Splinter likes me best?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'd love that, wouldn't you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WIDER - Don and Mikey are already sitting there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So nice of you to join us, gentledudes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And by the way, I prefer the classic military corner tuck for my bedsheets.

dialogues.speaker: M
dialogues.text: ikey and Don high five. Leo and Raph aren't amused. They stare down. Raph does his BULLY FLINCH fake-lunge... only doesn't twitch. Suddenly-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa! Whawazzat?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The others rush over to the edge with Mikey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You dudes see that up there?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OFF HIS LOOK - We see LARGE SHADOWS moving with in a larg BEAM CONSTRUCTION SITE. The movement is coming from one o the higher floors.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So what now, captain?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We need to come up with a plan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Later!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raph RUNS OFF toward the action.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RAPH!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But Raph doesn't stop. All three look at each other. Then

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Welcome home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 48 The boys cross over on a large CONSTRUCTION CRANE and sca up the few more stories to the top. They stand on a scaff underneath the floor of the activity. ON WALL - Deep CLAW MARKS are carved into the steel, much like by April and Casey's loft. Don notices.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guys, I've got a bad feeling...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ahh, let's take a tiny peek.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They scale to the top floor. Peering over the edge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, there's a good/bad news scenario for ya.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CAM BEGINS TO CRANE UP from Turtles to activity on the fl

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good news is that there are a buncha Foot Ninja gettin' the snot kicked out of `em.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CAM FINISHES ON FLOOR - Showing SIX FOOT NINJAS and KARAI squaring off against a LARGE BIGFOOT-LIKE MONSTER! It tos them around like stuffed animals.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bad news is WHAT's kickin' the snot out of `em...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON TURTLES - As they've all now crept up to the dark corn of the floor. A FOOT NINJA gets clobbered and sails past them, and off the building. (safely to a scaffold below)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An interesting conundrum. Do we hold dear the value of life and help the Foot regardless of our tumultuous past?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I vote for sitting back and enjoying the show. (to Leo) Whaddaya say, leader boy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON LEO - He's troubled. The burden of "leader" shouldered

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nah. We kick butt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raph jumps forward! Leo rolls his eyes, as all the Turtle jump into the fray. The Foot are surprised at first, and Bigfoot Monster is confused as well. ON LEO - He stops when he comes face to face with Karai.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who are YOU?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON KARAI - She pauses a moment. They exchange expert kata attacks. Stalemate. She gestures to the Foot as they use opportunity for their escape. As they leap away, Karai lo back at the Turtles...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Creature immediately CHASES the boys throughout the structure, as they use all their ninja skills to avoid it not to mention impalement on the bed of rebar below! aph tries to turn the tables and attacks the Creature! Th boys have no choice but to help him... putting them in de trouble. The I-Beam is getting dented and twisted with each impact The tussle begins to fall - whoomp, whoomp - down many flights of floors. Raph gets separated at one point, jumping off the side of building to catch up, and swings himself back onto the bo floor to await the others. SMASH! They fall into Raph's floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nice of ya's ta join me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But the Turtles eventually get cornered. And just as the Creature closes in-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: YEEEAAAAARGGHHH!!!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The creature stops. Confused. So are the other three turt

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? I saw it on a nature show once.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The creature SCREAMS BACK! Boys freak out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AAAAAAGGHHHHH!!!!!

dialogues.speaker: A
dialogues.text: NGLE ABOVE TURTLES - As a large teetering pallet filled w dried cement and blocks to come CRASHING DOWN ON THEM! Th Turtles are buried under the rubble. RUH? - The Creature is confused... until it's hit with a blinding light, and then an EXPLOSION - FWOOM! We hear he footsteps thumping through the light. Shapes start to for until we see... ...LIVING VERSIONS OF THE FOUR STONE GENERALS! Sporting H TECH GEAR - a mix of tech with ancient magic scrawlings. Their bodies "glow" with a red inner life, seeping throug their stone cracks and piercing eyes. The Generals are all ANIMAL-THEMED - Mute and powerful Ap themed costume ("MONO"), Eagle Leader ("AGUILA"), agile Jaguar ("GATO") and the deadly snake-like female ("SERPIENTE"). Large. Imposing. Completely bad-ass. The Creature ROARS and FIGHTS to no avail...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BURIED POV - Silent. The Turtles start to GROAN, regainin consciousness. Moonlight shoots in as they move the rock stand up, groggy. ON MOUTH OF ALLEY - Through the smoke we can see silhouet a large hairy shape, along with FOUR VERY LARGE SHAPES. T sounds of freighter doors CLOSING, engines revving and th caravan of sorts pulling away. WHOOOOOP! - A POLICE SIREN chirps. Approaching the now- destroyed site.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Better hit the tunnels, guys.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Donnie uses a small prod to prop open a MANHOLE COVER. Do Mike and Leo jump in. Leo looks back, Raph is still stewi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raph. Save it for another day.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RAPH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raph knows he has to go. Reluctantly he enters the sewer. lid closes as the alley is illuminated by POLICE CHERRIES

dialogues.speaker: A
dialogues.text: beat, then Mikey barely pops the lid open for another pee

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Y'know, it's not that bad, dudes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON BUILDING - Actually, the place is destroyed. Dented, t and looking like a post-night raid in WWII.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 49 UP ANGLE on the Tower. Dead of night. No one around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 50 A cavernous structure. Dimly lit. High ceiling. A few odd silhouettes here and there. We hear the clicking of Winters' shoes echo as he enters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What seems to be the problem?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Karai and six Ninja are already there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The "problem" is that we were hired to merely patrol the city and report anything "strange" to you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KARAI(cont'd) (grabs sword hilt) You never said anything about MONSTERS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winters smirks, looking at the mouse who thinks he can ta the lion. He reaches to a satchel on the floor. The Foot TENSE in anticipation. Instead... Winters comes up with a MONEY BRICK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (tosses money brick) So, your job duties were just redefined. Congratulations on your promotion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SHINK! - Karai pulls out her To and slices the brick in m air. Winters STOPS and looks back over his shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We may be hired help to you, but you should never forget... we are the Foot Clan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON WINTERS - Condescendingly finds this particularly `cut

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oooooooh...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It sets the Foot off. They all grab their weapons, moving toward Winters. Karai flips forward, sword drawn and at Winters throat! ...as Winters stands still... and begins to LAUGH. Slowly, the thumping of FOUR SETS OF FEET lumber out of t shadows. Reveal themselves to be THE FOUR STONE GENERALS. They flank Winters, who is just loving the theatricality it all. The Foot Ninja leap back. Winters remains confident and unmoving. Generals SMIRK at Karai and the Foot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I believe we made a deal, Karai. I expect you to honor it. (beat, stares her down) You do understand "honor", don't you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Karai stews... unblinking stare. Of course she does.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So I don't care what part of "muscle for hire" you don't understand. I hired your muscle. Now exercise the ones attached to your feet and... (closer - terse) ...get back to work.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Karai slowly steps back. Winters smiles wide, reaches int the drawer and takes another brick of bills and tosses it

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: a Foot Ninja. Then another to a second Ninja.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So I will double... no, no... TRIPLE your pay for your troubles. (stare down) Are we cool?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON FOOT - They just stare back, blank goggles. Probably seething inside. Winters is flanked by Generals.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are we... cool?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Foot don't move. Tense. Karai finally nods. Terse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ninjas. No sense of humor. (to Generals) So how did we fare?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CORRIDOR ENTRANCE - a hunched SHAPE undulating in chains wheeled into the light. Winters approaches it - chained to a high-tech and uplit pallet on the floor. We can barely make it out as being t HAIRY CREATURE from the I-beam fight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (close, quiet) So it begins...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It SCREAMS. Fights it's restraints. Tires. Breathing heav Winters approaches, safely inches away from his fanged ma Creature suddenly lunges forward! Winters doesn't flinch. merely grins at the creature.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to General Aguila) Were there any problems?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AGUILA speaks in a gravelly, hardened voice. He towers ov Winters by a foot. Clearly the leader of the four.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: None, my lord.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Karai) You see, now THAT'S a good soldier. You two should compare notes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Karai and Aguila stare at each other. Karai obviously not used to being handled like this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just what is this all about?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, let's call it a scavenger hunt. (re: Generals) I now have the power and know-how, but I need the speed and stealth of an organization such as your own. Not to mention an organization that values discretion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But of course.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You see, I have nine more beasts like this that should be coming to town very soon. Thirteen in all, to be exact.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Four Generals move the monster into a position on the floor ahead - into a DISK on the floor. ON CEILING - We s the top of a CAGE inserted over top, creating a cell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But... why? Why here? Why now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Instinct, mostly. They're animals at their core. (looks off, distant) And they recognize something familiar in the air... in the stars. (BEAT) What can I say? I'm a lover of animals.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The disk ROTATES. WIDER we see that there are already som cells inserted on the large stone disk in the floor. Fill by darkened silhouettes of creatures that we're probably

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: we don't fully see. Glowing eyes pierce out of the darkne

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So you go and get to know each other. And don't forget... play nice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Generals turn and walk-push the Foot out of the door. They move to fight back, but Karai waves her hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not now. Our business will be handled at a later time...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: After they leave, we pause for A BEAT on Winters. Quiet. Tired. Contemplative.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three brothers sit around their breakfast table, looking over from the previous night's brawl. Mikey comes in, loo the worst of all, and plops into his seat. Cam circles ta

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dudes, did anyone get the license plate of the thing that hit us last night? Oi, my head...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don pours over a thick book on MONSTERS AND MYTHOLOGY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Was it just me, or did that creature look familiar?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We coulda taken it if you slackers woulda pitched in sooner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fact remains, Raph, that we should have never been there in the first place.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, I suppose that we shoulda let Mr. Cuddly-kins continue to spread happiness throughout the city... oh wait... HE WAS A FREAKING MONSTER TRYIN' TA KILL US!!! Good call, fearless leader.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come to think of it, it WAS pretty strange to see the Foot too. And who was that woman?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I dunno, but she sure gave Leo a run for his money.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (still fighting with Raph) This is my fault now, Raph? I'm the only one who has to be responsible!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, you're the "trained master", not me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (quickly interjected) Dudes-can-it-here-comes-Splinter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON DOOR - Splinter walks in, HUMMING to himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good morning, my sons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Morning, sensei.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Splinter makes himself a TEA. Room is SILENT. ON TURTLES - Raph and Leo GLARE at one another while they eat. Don is pouring over a THICK BOOK while Mikey sits wi his forehead on the table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If anyone needs me, I'll be watching my stories.

dialogues.speaker: S
dialogues.text: plinter walks out. OS sound of the TV being turned on. At the table, the glare continues.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hothead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Splinter-junior.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And in the latest of a string of strange criminal activity, a construction site was nearly destroyed last night. Authorities believe a violent battle had taken place earlier that evening.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The boys react and rush into the MAIN LIVING AREA. ON TV - a well-coifed News Reporter stands outside of the BEAM TOWER. In the daylight, we can see the building is twisted and dented from the night's fighting. The boys immediately JUMP FORWARD. Mikey grabs the remote ups the volume.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My sons, what-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Splinter's eyes go wide. He looks at his boys listening t the TV intently. Mikey nurses his sore head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I believe you boys have some explaining to do...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Splinter looks at the Turtles. Busted, as we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Turtles are kneeling before their sensei.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leonardo, I am most disappointed in you. You are the leader of your brothers. I was counting on you to bring order to the chaos of this family.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But Master Splinter, how can I be expected to do so when Ra-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There are no excuses when you are the Leader, my student.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON LEO - Biting his tongue. Hard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But the involvement of the Foot and their mysterious leader worries me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm personally worried about a monster running around the streets of New York. But hey, that's just me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don elbows Mikey back in line.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We hafta go out and find who's responsible for this. There ain't no other solution.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raphael, there are better ways to use your skills in ninjitsu. Fact- gathering. Analysis. Observation. Direct contact should only be your last resort.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow, sounds... exciting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Save the brute vigilante junk for that Nightwing guy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Nightwatcher".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whatever.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raph stands and exits the room. The others stay silent as

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 53 QUICK SHOTS - Nightwatcher gearing up. ightwatcher emerges from a MAN HOLE. Walks to a long- forgotten and shadowed underside of a BRIDGE. He points u with a REMOTE - chirp! Slowly, his MOTORBIKE begins to lo on retractable grappling hooks.

dialogues.speaker: O
dialogues.text: N BIKE - Explodes out of a BACK ALLEY and into the night.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 54 Various shots of Nightwatcher tearing all over the city. bike and on foot. Angry. Trying to work it out of his sys He's swallowed it all up to this point... getting harder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 55 Aggressive and driving music. Various shots of the Stone Generals capturing a laundry list of CREATURES that are coming into the city. See the tech, detail and precision the Winters' operation works. Foot Ninja act as living "tracking devices" around the city. - The Generals capture a Sloth-like creature, jumping in throughout rafters above. The Foot try to help by blockin exits. - The Generals capture a werewolf-like creature in the hi speed subway tunnels. The Foot maneuver the subway car. - General Mono takes on a large scale YETI-like monster. WWE-sized match set in a large abandoned warehouse. - Close calls, as humans come close to seeing the monster but rarely do. We see small house pets swiped away. Fleet glimpses of limbs, claws and teeth in the shadows all ove NYC. Meat trucks torn open and their contents "stolen". - Intermix quick shots of Generals and collars clamping, cells locking, etc.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - See more cells being filled in Winters Basement. ONLY 3 EMPTY CELLS REMAIN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quiet part of the neighborhood. Their lights are fully on

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You sure you don't want to spar a bit?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 57 April is dressed in work-out gear on a grouping of floor mats. She twirls a wooden KATANA as part of a floor routi Wow - she's actually pretty good! Casey eats a bag of chi with one hand, does curls with a dumbbell with the other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nah. Ever since you started with the blade weapons you, um... you kinda scare me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suit yourself. (she stops - a beat) Case?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you happy? I mean, with your life. With me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Casey pauses a beat. Tries to be upbeat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. Sure. (beat - serious) You?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: April thinks just as much.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They sit on that for a moment. Casey leans in for a kiss. April doesn't notice. Awkward. Casey changes his mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (walks to the window) I'm going outside for some air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Casey slips out onto the fire escape. April knows better.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to herself) Be safe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Casey climbs up from the fire escape. Checks to make sure he's alone. He reaches inside a chimney flue and pulls ou A BASEBALL BAT and his CLASSIC WHITE HOCKEY MASK! He slips it on. Does a few warm up swings. Cricks his nec

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All is still, until the panicked face of a BURGLAR enters frame. Being held by his collar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'M SORRY MAN! I-I-I WON'T EVER DO IT AGAIN! I'M SORR-OOOF!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BAM! - the leather fist of Nightwatcher slams Burglar bac tripping over an A/C duct. He tries to shield himself- REVERSE ANGLE - BOOM! - Nightwatcher lands in the FG.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Funny how you jerks don't care about crossing the line `til someone else does it... all over yer HEAD!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Night hurls him back into a roof access door, denting it. Raph's loving this. Walks to the Burglar and picks him up

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (almost in tears) I'M SORRY! I'M SORRY!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boy, oh boy, did YOU pick the wrong night to be a criminal...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Night cocks his fist just as-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey champ. You think you're being a little rough on the guy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ight slowly turns around. Menacing. Casey's taken aback.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you that Nightwatcher fella? (beat - unimpressed) A little smaller than I expected.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (inside helmet) Case? No way!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (poking Raph with bat) I'm talkin' to you, pal. You think you own these rooftops? Well, lemme teach you a thing'r two. (takes out bat) Class is Pain 101. Meet your instructor... Casey Jones.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's getting serious. Casey's bat is suddenly wrapped by Night's CHAIN, and pulled down. Raph's visor flips up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (GRINNING) You keep on playing with fire, little man, you might just get burnt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raph?! Is that you?! (scans costume) What-what are you doing?! THINKS) Are you pretending to be...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON RAPH - His eyes look around for an answer. Nothing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why would you- (finally gets it) -oh. (a beat) So that would mean... (then REALLY gets it) -OOOHHHHHH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raph smiles... the first genuine one he's had in a long t

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yep.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: IN BG - The Burglar tries to get away. Casey and Raph bot spy him. Look at each other. Mischievously grin as we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON - The panicked face of the Burglar. CAM ROTATES show him hanging upside-down. CAM WIDENS TO REVEAL he's b by chains and dangling from a street lamp! CAM PANS UP THE BG BUILDING TO REACH - the two old friend sit perched on a high tower, surrounded by gargoyles. The blend right in. Both masks are off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I dunno, I just got tired of the "nothing". Sitting around waiting for some disaster to cross our paths. Of us battling Utroms and Triceratons or any other friggin' creature... when there was still some guy gettin' mugged 100 feet above the lair. Just didn't seem right. `Specially if we had the means to do somethin' about it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raph twirls a billy bat between his fingers. Stops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And we did... but turns out I was the only one who was willing to do it, tho. So I just saved up, bought and tweaked a sweet bike, fitted the costume and began moonlighting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Papers called me "The Nightwatcher", so I went with it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "And a legend was born". So what was your handle before that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I kinda liked "The Midnight Marauder"...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (makes an "eww" face) Stick with Nightwatcher, ninja boy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The guys ever catch on?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pfft. You kiddin' me? Leo's been away for, like, forever. And the other two are so wrapped up in that party business they'd never notice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So what about you? How's things with April? Haven't seen ya's since you two moved in together...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're good... I guess. I dunno, seems like all I do lately is just make her upset. She used to laugh so much... now it's mostly just working all day, and coming home to point out how I'm a screw up. (points to hockey mask) She doesn't like me doing this. And I know she's pretending to not know I'm out tonight. But she knows. And she knows I know she knows. (looks out at city) Life just kinda got complicated suddenly... y'know?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yer tellin' me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Casey looks at his old bud.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raph?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nice to see ya, man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raph acknowledges. The moment is broken by a HORRIBLE SHR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What was that?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They both spring to their feet and run to the back of the roof. They hear the scream AGAIN off in the distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For old time's sake?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the shell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON RAPH - He stops, mid-replacement of his helmet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bro. Seriously.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 61 The two run and leap across the rooftops. Two vigilantes searching for the source of the scream. They finally reac point where they don't hear it anymore. EDGE OF ROOFTOP - They look out. Silent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think we lost it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's gotta be around here somewhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SCREEEEECH!!! - A large VAMPIRE-LIKE CREATURE flies up fr the alley below and spreads its 30-foot wings!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WAAAAAAAAAAAGGGHHHH!!!!!!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's about to attack when - THUNKA-THUNKA-THUNKA - it's drilled with TRANQUILIZER DARTS from below! CHOOOM! - A grappling hook winds around its feet. The Creature strugg but is pulled down hard!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHAT'S GOIN' ON, RAPH?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did I mention we ran into a monster last week?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NO. NO, YOU KINDA FAILED TO TELL ME ABOUT THAT ONE, BUDDY!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They inch closer to the edge. Peek over. ON ALLEY - See the Four Generals putting a pounding on th Creature. They subdue it with all their hardware. The Foo stand guard, helping in the BG.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The freakin' FOOT?! (looks to Generals) What about the walking statues? Were you going to mention THOSE?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nope. Those are a first for me too. (gets cocky) We can take `em.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of the generals effortlessly picks up a TRASH DUMPSTE and wallops the Creature with one blow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On second thought...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Generals put the Creature in a cell. Wheel it to a TRANSPORTER VEHICLE as it drives away. They're just about leave when-

dialogues.speaker: S
dialogues.text: HINK! - Casey accidentally knocks a tiny piece of rock fr the ledge. It falls down - CLANG! - on a garbage can lid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON GENERALS - they turn around. Look up. GENERAL GATO POV - He scans the two. Organic Earth-based.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Witnesses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aguila snarls and fires the tranq gun! Raph dives in fron Casey, taking the hit himself!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AAAARRGGH!!!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Gato) Fetch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gato SMILES as the other three board a Transport Vehicle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raph takes out NINJA SMOKE PELLETS and throws them on the roof - FWOOM! When the smoke clears, Casey is standing th alone! Raph is 10 feet away as Casey flinches and takes o too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You ever heard of smoke pellets?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey - you're the ninja, not me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOOM! - Gato lands up on the roof and quickly gives chase They can't lose him, even when they drop to street level.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 2 Raph and Casey are tearing ass through the alleyways, try to escape the thing that's close on their tail.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHAT WERE THOSE THINGS, RAPH?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raph ignores him, looking for a street sign. Then he sees 56th Street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bingo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raphael quickly dashes left through TRAFFIC! DOWN ALLEY BEHIND THEM - BOOM BOOM BOOM - We see Gato bounding down the wall, almost in a four-legged run, occasionally jumping off walls at incredible speeds! A tr jaguar. It leaps through the traffic as well.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: UNDER A BRIDGE - Raph points up and - CHOOP! - hits a rem that lowers his MOTORCYCLE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are we gonna do, Raph? WHAT ARE WE GONNA- (sees bike) -hey, cool ride.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hop on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raph leaves Gato in a cloud of dust... but not for long. clamors along... keeping up with the weaving bike! In the fray, Casey looses his mask... as it gets trampled by Gat It's an insane chase, with Raph trying to lose him as Cas swings his bat, trying to stave off the Stone General. Suddenly - THUNK! A circular OBSIDIAN BLADE lands in his wooden bat. He loo at it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
