dialogues.text: Um, Raph?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raph sees the blade! They manage to switch positions in m ride, with Casey driving and Raph in back. Raph throws ki and punches at their pursuer when he closes in. The chase takes them to a PARKING GARAGE as they circle upwards, Gato jumping from car to car, still on their tai ROOFTOP - They're trapped. He doesn't have a hope... asid from jumping the bike to the next roof!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: T hisiscrazythisiscrazythisiscrazy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He lets out the clutch as they make the jump! WHAM! - Spa and crucial pieces fly off the undercarriage. They both l back at Gato up and away at the top of the structure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SUCK ON THAT, ROCK FACE! (Gato leaves edge) THAT'S WHAT I THOUGHT, PUNK!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...and then -thumpthumpthump- Gato JUMPS DOWN TOWARD THEM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh crap.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Casey guns it - BUT THE BIKE DOESN'T WORK ANYMORE - as Ga is in mid-air, taking off. Casey grabs the weakening Raph drags him off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gato lands and patrols the roof... almost SNIFFING them o Casey and Raph are barely hidden inside a rooftop shack. Suddenly - BOOM! - Gato finds them. He tries to smash thr the steel door with his bare hands! Raph leans his body into the door as a last ditch effort. He's taking a pounding as the door is denting with each s by Gato. Casey tries to help as well. Gato comes close to breaking in. Very tense. Then- -the LIGHT on his exo-suit begins to STROBE. A signal. A signal to return home. He surveys quickly... then runs of Casey and Raph fall out. Both shell-shocked.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, so it was great seein' ya again, Raph.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raph?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON RAPHAEL - He's got a dart in his shoulder, obsidian di stuck in his shell, and has collapsed unconscious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gotta get you someplace safe, pal. And then, then I need to go buy some new undies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 64 April is finishing up with her workout. She hears the fir escape outside of the building and the window slide open.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Casey, I think we need to talk. (turns around) I don't want- whoa.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OFF HER LOOK - Casey is standing there, bracing the near- unconscious Raph, now without his Nightwatcher garb.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Could use a little... help here...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey April... how ya been?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raph passes out as we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Splinter and the other three are finishing up dinner. The close the pizza box.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My compliments to zee chef.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Le brrrraaaaaaapp!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mikey walks to the fridge of leftover birthday cake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anyone for dessert?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sick of cake) NO!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The phone suddenly rings. Don rushes over to the jury-rig payphone on the wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: COWABUNGA-CARL-PARTY-SERVICES- Cowabunga-dude. (face falls) Waita-slow down April. What happened to Raph?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll be right there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 66 ON WINDOW - One by one, Leo, Don and Mikey slip into the window. They spot Raph on the futon, being tended to by A

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: and Casey. Mikey looks around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa... I am in the wrong line of work. Nice pad, kids.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don immediately starts checking Raph out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His vital signs seem to be okay. (opens his eye) Pupil dilation is normal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raph weakly pushes Donnie's head away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (WEAKLY) Get the... frig offa me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Temper is normal too. (to others) He's going to be fine. Health-wise, I mean. Otherwise, he's still the same old Raph. (BEAT) Whoa.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON RAPH'S SHELL - Two Obsidian Disks are wedged in his ba with a Tranquilizer Dart. Donnie wedges out the Obsidian with pliers. LOSE ON - Disk. It's beautiful and deadly. Don examines.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Some sort of stone... probably obsidian, I think. (CLOSER) There's an engraving on it. Looks... South American. Aztec? No. It's definitely not Mayan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: April swallows hard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It can't be.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What can't be, April?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: April sits down on the floor with the disk. Trying to fig things out. Casey leans down to her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Would it help things if I said that we were being chased by a one of those statues you collected for that Winters guy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON APRIL - Her mouth is agape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'd say that's a big ten-four.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (MUTTERING) It's just a myth... a legend. (CLOSER) It can't be.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And I suppose that bringing up the thirty-foot flying monster would probably just push this over the edge, huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON APRIL - She slowly turns to Casey. Floored.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you talking about Casey?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just some story this Winters guy told us. It all started down in South America. Long before the Ashmecks and the Macaroons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Azteks and Mayans.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's what i said.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sit down, Jones. (to group) So there was this guy call Yaotl...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CAM PANS TO THE RIGHT - As it passes a FG element, the sc dips to black. We hear sounds of a violent BATTLE. Monste shrieking. Blades clashing. April's retelling Winters' st

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone is gathered around as April finishes. Mikey, in particular, is hunched over, intent. Casey, like before, fallen asleep. Silence for a beat. Then-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well?! WHAT NEXT?!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No one knows. The legend stops there. THINKS) But it's just a legend.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Donnie studies the tranq dart under a magnifying glass of April's.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The micro-tech of this dart is astounding. The molybdenum is of a grade only found in a few select markets... not to mention it's current stock is going for a little more than two-grand an ounce right now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DONATELLO(cont'd) (looks up) What? I dabble in the market.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So what do we have? We have someone with a lot of money.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Access to technology... and the means to produce it to exact specs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not to mention having a keen interest in these monsters... and them four stone jokers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you ask me, it all somehow points to Winters Corp.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How do you figure that, Donnie?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Donatello looks up with MAGNIFYING GOGGLES on. Sarcastic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello? "Genius"? (a beat) Well, that, and the fact that this part has a Winters Corporation logo on it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you think he's trying to recreate the events from back then?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, what would you do with an army of monsters?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, aside from having your own wrestling league, I dunno... MAYBE TAKE OVER THE WORLD?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do bad guys still try to do that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, however they're usually mortgage re-fi companies. (THEN) What about it, April? You just finished working with the guy, right? Does it make sense?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guys! It's a legend!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is that "legend" like the ginormous freakin' hairball that attacked us?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or "legend" like the moving statues and flying creature that attacked me n' Casey?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay. Fine. I'll help for now... until we prove you're all insane.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or until we prove Winters is up to something more than collecting art.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll work with April and see if these Stars of Kikin she told us about can give us any clues.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I say we just storm the castle and face this jerk in person!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raph, that would be the worst idea yet. We hang back. Analyze. Formulate a plan, THEN storm your castle. Are we clear?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tense stare off between Raph and Leo. Raph moves anyway. Casey stops him. Quieter moment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raph. Don't do it, man. (BEAT) I spent my whole life running out of rooms ticked off at the world. I wish I could take most of `em back. Sometimes, just takin' a breather is the best thing to do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON APRIL - She's listening to Casey... maybe her man-boy growing up. Raph knows he can't win.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah... whatever.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - and bolts out the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cam is moving fast... really fast down the pipes. Raph EXPLODES into frame, running faster than us. He lifts up BACK PACK... He pulls it open, revealing his Night gear. - as he grabs an overhead PIPE and flips up and outta sig

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 68 We see the same stars we've been tracking move closer int alignment... only now it means so much more to us. CAM LOWERS, as we find ourselves- 6

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Donnie looks through a thick book on ASTRONOMY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Think this is all of them, Donnie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON DOOR - April walks in, holding a 3-foot-high stack of yellowed documents.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I cleaned out my archives on ancient South America. Might have found something useful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She takes out a hand-drawn map.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A map of the stars, as recorded by an Aztec Shaman. They pinpoint the location of the Stars of Kikin... even though the names changed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For use in an Aztec calendar. (picks up map) So, if we can cross-reference our current star field, positioning of the Stars of Kikin and backtrack positioning based off of the Aztec CALENDAR-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -along with taking into account the point of origin of the first occurrence, we should know where another portal could take place. (to herself) Max, what are you up to?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leo paces back and forth in the main area. Splinter walks Mikey plays video games on the main TV.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leonardo, time cannot be moved faster by wearing a groove in our floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seriously, dude. We're all stressed. Try to chill.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're playing video games on the possible eve of Armageddon, Mikey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But I never said I was having fun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leo looks at the clock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's Raph?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leonardo, a true leader knows the virtue of patience... and when to stop exercising it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're almost done, Leo. You might want to go get him... If you can find him, that is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leo looks at Splinter, clearly feeling leadership pressur and Raph's absence makes it worse. He leaves the lair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 70 Relatively peaceful. A few freighters off in the distance Tall dry grass rustles in the wind, as we see a- - TREASURE HUNTER - A stocky middle-aged FAT MAN with a clicking metal detector. Big goofy earphones cover his ea

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Monay, monay, monay, MONAYYYY (really high-pitched, bad) ...monay!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: POV FROM WATER - Steadicam shot, watching the man patrol under the light of the moon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The clicking intensifies. He follows the signal for twent feet. Drops to the ground and digs the sand... . ..and comes up with a old unopened CAN OF SARDINES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pfft. Figgers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns to leave the beach.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lousy metal detector. "Happy Anniversary" present, my big fat keister.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He HURLS the can of sardines over his shoulder. Only, ins of hearing a tiny SPLASH from it hitting the water... we a snarling CRUNCH and TINNY-CHEWING. The man stops in his tracks. He turns his head around. CLOSE ON - Man's face, eyes wide in shock. Cam pulls back slowing just as the crown of a GNARLY SKULL crests the bo of the screen. PTOOEY! - The tin "key" is spit back onto the sand. He bo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AAAAAAAAGGGHHHHH!!!!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 71 It's dark. Barely lit in the hallways of the top private floors of Winters Tower. The camera travels the long and ornate hallways. Decorate a different sense than the main building... in a sense of family, tradition and legacy. ictures spanning centuries in age. Some photos. Some portraits. Families. Loved ones.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cam continues until we find a high-backed chair parked in front of an oversized blazing FIREPLACE. ON CHAIR - Winters sits. Tired. Sullen. Sipping brandy. L above the fireplace and lifts his snifter in a toast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To picking up the pieces.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ABOVE FIREPLACE - is a suit of armor... THE suit of armor none other than Yaotl the Conqueror. He looks at it with heavy thought. Then-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winters doesn't turn around. Stays in E-FG. Cam adjusts t show the shape of GENERAL AGUILA in the doorway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two creatures remain, my lord.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A long beat. Winters closes his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, by all means then. Let's finish it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON AGUILA - He squints. Deep in thought and not sharing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 73 Nightwatcher runs along the rooftops. He pauses. He lifts visor to feel the night air on his face. He sees WINTERS TOWER in the distance... practically egging him on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 74 Classic Diner design, Pete's Diner is closed for the even The last light goes out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 75 A greasy DINER COOK finishes cleaning up the tables. He suddenly hears a noise in the back. Big CLANK. KITCHEN - He walks to the back. He hears the noise... now from inside the WALK-IN FREEZER. He slowly approaches it. ANOTHER NOISE. He moves to open INSIDE OF FREEZER - the door slowly opens. The man's face peers in. His eyes go WIDE. He SCREAMS!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 76 Nightwatcher hears the scream. Runs to the source and loo down at Pete's Diner. Sees the commotion inside. Uses his bolo chain and a power cable to form a ZIP LINE down the street as-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -KERSMASH! He goes through the front window! He stands, c like. Ready for anything. The room is only lit by the neo signage behind the counter. Suddenly - Night creeps to the freezer. He can hear the CHEWING and SNARLING behind the thick door. He takes out a spiked bra knuckle. Ready. Places a hand on the door... and opens it ON DOORWAY - The creature is huddled over a pile of froze meat. Chewing with pieces flying everywhere. Disgusting. turns around - monkey-like and ferocious looking DEMON... "cute" in a bizarre kinda way. Music builds as go- WIDER ON SIDE VIEW - Night stands there. The horrible dem creature suddenly jumps out of the freezer too! Face off Raph as we realize- -it's only THREE FEET TALL!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey there little fella. All that commotion for just little ole y-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Demon SCREAMS! It jumps Night, slamming him to the fl behind a row of tables!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WAHH! OOOF! AAAGGH! OW!! WHOAAA!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plates, glasses and utensils fly everywhere, smashing all over the diner as the Demon pummels him. CLOSE ON NIGHT - The Demon is jumping up and down, slammi his helmeted head repeatedly to the floor! It lunges forw mouth open as Night backhands it with a PLATE. The Demon jumps back and up, landing on a rotating CEILING FAN.

dialogues.speaker: T
dialogues.text: he creature lunges down again, but this time, Night is ready. He fights back. Like fighting with a Chihuahua hop up on cocaine. A break in the fight. The creature has disappeared. Night knows he's there. He preps. Grabs his SMOKE PELLETS from pocket. And waits... until... ...the Demon swoops in for another attack! Mouth open, fa bared as Night tosses the smoke pellets inside! WIDE - POOOMPH! POOOMPH! POOOMPH! The pellets explode in mouth, sending smoke shooting out of it's nostrils, ears eyes! It shrieks, flying out of the Diner!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (victory taunting) Yeah! That's what I thought! Don't mess with the Nightwatcher!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Night turns. His helmet is still on. He hits his LIGHTS o the side of his head to see through the thick smoke. He f the DINER COOK huddled behind the counter. Night looks sc

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pl-pl-please don't hurt me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whattaya talkin' about? I JUST SAVED YOU!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please, sir. I have kids.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Night looks around. He sees the CASH REGISTER on the floo He picks it up, puts it on the counter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There ya go, pal. Make sure this is safe. HEY - YOU HEARIN' ME?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TAKE IT! JUST TAKE IT! DON'T HURT ME, PLEASE!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LISTEN! I DON'T WANT YER FRIGGIN' CASH! WHY DOES EVERYONE HAVE SUCH A HARD TIME BELIEVIN' I'M A GOOD GUY? (points threatening) I JUST SAVED YOUR STINKIN' LIFE!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sudddenly - SHINK! - a THROWING STAR is lodged in the cas register till! Night jumps. Looks out the window. CAM PULLS WAY WAY BACK, REALLY FAST - Out the Diner and t the rooftop across the street... and over the green shoul of LEO. ll he sees is a panicked man and the large shape of Nightwatcher standing over him, holding the register. CLOSE ON LEO - He's fuming. Staring down at Nightwatcher. frustration of the last few days pent up inside of him.

dialogues.speaker: B
dialogues.text: ACK IN DINER - Night slowly lays down the register. Tryin to figure out his next move.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This night just keeps gettin' better n' better...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tense stand-off as... Night suddenly bolts out the back a Leo bolts the roof in hot pursuit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Night tears down the streets and through back alleys. Leo keeps up with him effortlessly, hurling an assortment of THROWING STARS his way. Night suddenly DASHES OUT into traffic! Jumping over pass cars from roof to roof!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nice try, amateur.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leo crosses the busy street while still maintaining his secrecy. Zip lines through power lines, avoids an oncomin bus, and flips back onto a cable. e swings and manages to snag Nightwatcher in mid-leap!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oof! You're a heavy boy, aren't you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They both land on a fire escape, as Night clamors to the Leo wastes no time in catching up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The chase continues. Night giving it his all, and Leo kee up pretty easily. He throws Leo a pretty strong curveball and Leo barely recovers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, someone's been training pretty hard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It begins to spit rain - and becomes a FRANK MILLER DOWNP

dialogues.speaker: EXT. ROOFTOP DEAD END
dialogues.text: 80 Night reaches an area that's a DEAD END. One side of the buildings has a LARGE LETTERED SIGN facing away. Fills th rooftop with silhouettes. No choice but to turn around... ...as Leo slows to a stop at the other end of the buildin

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want you to know that I appreciate your intentions. But you can't change the world like this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: INSIDE HELMET - All we hear is rain pouring. Raph can't h Leo - just sees him wagging his finger at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to himself in helmet)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh god. He's lecturing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (now audible) ...so I'm going to give you one chance to just walk away and stop this vigilante nonsense.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leo unsheathes his two katanas. Raph can't hear him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to himself in helmet) Okay, Leo. Wanna play?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nightwatcher drops TWIN BOLOS. He twirls them with expertise... then motions for Leo to fight. Charge at eac other, running through the rain, weapons drawn. They fight. Hard. And with expertise. Two masters duking out. It surprises Leo. It fills Night with more adrenalin There's a break. They circle like tigers. Renewing attack Night knows every one of Leo's moves, and counters in tur

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? How did you-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...then he starts goading him on. Pushing Leo. Prodding. Making him MAD. ...and then Leo fights back. HARD. Night can't keep up. Leo uses every bit of his control, restraint and expertise. He surgically slices the bind un Night's helmet. He jumps on top of the vigilante.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goodnight, dark prince.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leo UPPERCUTS Night, knocking his helmet off! His face falls... IT'S RAPHAEL! Leo pales.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: R-raph? (THINKS) What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But Raph doesn't feel like explaining. Refuses defeat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AAAAAAAAGHH!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He mule kicks Leo back. Leo tumbles back, still in shock. They yell at each other through the pouring rain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're so friggin' smug! You think the world revolves around YOU, dontcha? That we couldn't POSSIBLY survive without the mighty and powerful Leonardo to guide us through our problems, HUH?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, I gotta newsflash for ya - we got along just fine without you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was training! Training to be a better leader! For you! Why do you hate me for that?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...and whoever said I wanted to be led? I shoulda gone on that training!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Y OU WEREN'T READY! You're impatient and hot-tempered! And more importantly... I'm better than you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raph stops in his tracks. Reaches behind his back... and pulls out his TWIN SAIS. He flips them to the front.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, big brother, I'd have to disagree with you on that one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raph takes a ready stance. Leo does too. And they fight. Brother vs. brother. Katana vs. Sai. Technique vs. Heart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 81 In another part of the city, the Generals have caught the Demon from Pete's Diner. As they carry him to the caravan their RADIO COMM goes off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Foot report of strange activity five blocks north of your location.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The final creature.

dialogues.speaker: EXT. ROOFTOP DEAD END
dialogues.text: 82 Camera RISES UP until we reach the rooftop where Leo and continue to duke it out in the rain. They battle. In the end, Raph becomes an uncontrollable b of anger, unleashing everything on Leo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It ends with Raph pinning Leo to the ground... holding a

dialogues.speaker: MILLIMETERS FROM HIS EYEBALL
dialogues.text: Tense. Raph shakes. He looks like he's going to do it... stops. He collapses back. Almost ashamed of what he's don Leo just can't believe that Raph bested him. They pant heavily. The rain dies down. Raph RUNS AWAY, across a few rooftops. Away from his brot He suddenly STOPS and looks back at Leo, small in the distance. CLOSE ON LEO - A SHADOW suddenly falls over him. He looks to see the FOUR GENERALS surrounding him. He tries to fig back... but is too wiped from Raph. GATO POV - "reading" Leo on the ground. He frowns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is neither monster nor human.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON AGUILA - He manages a small smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then he shall perfectly serve our purposes... let us inform our commander that the final creature has been captured.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON RAPH - He sees the commotion from afar... as Leo gets TRANQUILIZED with the Generals' dart cannon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LEO!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raph runs closer as the Generals lower to the ground and drive off. Raph jumps from rooftop to rooftop to try and catch his brother.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: L eo!!! Hang on!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But the Caravan is too fast, and eventually loses Raph.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NOOOOOOOO!!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raph gets weak and collapses to his knees on the roof. Th sun begins to rise. He has to return to the sewer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 83 April and Don are poring over books at the kitchen. Mikey paces behind them. Raph storms in, barrels past them all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raphael walks to Splinter, practicing himself in the dojo Raph holds his Sais in one hand, his bolo chain in the ot Clenches both tight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raphael? What is the matter?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was out, and did... something... something happened and I- ARRRGH!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raphael picks up a HEAVY WEIGHT and hurls is across the d Splinter is unfazed, but he won't take any more.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raphael! Kneel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raph stops. Breathing heavy. Falls in line - walking to Splinter and dropping to his knees in front of his father

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I did something... I did something really stupid, Master Splinter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go on...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know why you chose him now. I know that there's a reason why he's the better son and I'm not.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And I think I made things worse tonight. (beat - calming down) A WHOLE lot worse... I know you must be ashamed of me, father.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raphael is lost in his guilt. Splinter kneels in front of Raph.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raphael. You always bear the world's problems on your shoulders. It is an admirable quality when you are a protector of others...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: plinter gently lays a hand on Raph's shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But you must realize that while, at times, you may not be my favorite student, it does not mean that you are my least favorite son.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raphael looks up. Having not thought of it that way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are strong, passionate and loyal to a fault. These are the merits of a great leader as well... but only when tempered with compassion and humility.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But Master Splinter, I messed up big tonight... I mean BIG.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Splinter chews on this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leonardo? R

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (beat, ashamed) Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Splinter is grim. Nods. But he moves on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well then, I believe your brothers may be in need of a leader.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raphael looks up. Finally, his shot. He holds his SAIS in hand, and his BOLO CHAIN in the other. Ninja Turtle vs. Nightwatcher. He grips them both hard. He drops the chain

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you... father.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mikey bursts in the door, frantic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dudes. I think you're gonna want to check this out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's Leo?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raph and Splinter share a look. Raph has to tell the othe

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 85 April and Donnie sift through their charts and calculatio

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, the first time that this portal was opened, the Stars of Kikin aligned... (sketches on high tech SCREEN) ...and that's why it occurred in that specific South American region. (more doodles) Now if we take into account the continual rotation of the Earth since then, as well as the gradual celestial shift that's happened and been recorded over... well, over the course of that mountain of books over there... we now know our new location.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Donnie's drawn a NEW LINE from the alignment of the stars April elbows Casey to wake him up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Precisely at 40.748 degrees latitude and -073.985 Degrees longitude.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON OTHERS - HUH?! Mikey air - calculates math in bg.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: New York City.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winters Tower.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And the alignment is due to occur in precisely- (checks watch) - well... tonight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It sits in the room. Heavy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But without Leo... what do we do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No one answers. Splinter looks to Raph. Raph steps up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We rescue our brother... and save New York City.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Splinter stands to his side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DARK STORM CLOUDS gather over Winters Tower. A horrible electrical storm is brewing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 7 The lobby has changed. Shots establishing the jury-rigged nature of Winters Tower. - The large Aztec-like calendar on the lobby floor sudden SPLITS and slides open, creating a 100 foot circle in the middle. Underneath is the TOWERS CELL BASEMENT.

The   disk in the basement is suddenly RAISED up to the l area,   replacing the slick marble design with an antiqua stone   version. Only now, THIRTEEN CREATURE CELLS surrou disk.   Very ceremonial. - Finally, Winters' office elevator LOWERS from high abov He's in the actual ceremonial gear worn by Yaotl years ag He holds the helmet to his side. Very serious. He looks o his now-ceremonial lobby... satisfied. PUSH IN on one cell, as Leo sits hunched over, unconsciou and helpless...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 88 Quick shots of April and Casey gearing up. Casey with his the-shelf sporting gear. April with sleek-looking Japanes combat gear and weaponry. They both emerge from their rooms, dressed to kill. Casey jaw drops as we scope out April.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (models it) Picked it up on my last trip to Japan. You... like it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh... oh yeah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They share the moment. Seeing what they forgot about each other when they first met. It's enough for them to smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's your mask?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (faking confusion) Mask? What mask?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: April runs into the other room and comes back with her ha behind her back. She takes out a NEW MASK for Casey - coo crisp and a badass paintjob.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No way...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was saving it for our anniversary.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Almost awkward as Casey leans forward and is about to kis her... Then a MUSICAL TUNE (first bar of the TMNT series) plays on a car horn outside, interrupting them again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's our ride.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CAM PULLS BACK from the back seat. Everyone is in "the zo Splinter and Don sit in the back seat. Pulling further to the front, we see April and Casey. nd on Raph in passenger seat and Mikey driving.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know I ain't much on speeches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But we can do this. Leo, or no Leo. (looks around) Not because of our individual strengths... but because of how we function as a team.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I love you man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't push it. (to April) April, this is going to be dangerous. You sure you're in?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I feel responsible, fellas. I found the Generals for him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CAM CONTINUES TO PULL OUT - as the familiar jingle of Cowabunga Carl fades in and we see the Cowabunga Carl Par

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Van in full view.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nice an' incognito there, Mikey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, I didn't see you offering any suggestions... besides- (imitates Splinter) - a true ninja can hide in plain sight, my son!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I heard that!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Van takes off as the CAMERA SLOWS in the street, watching drive away. NYC civilians point to the sky, worried. PUSH on a TV/STEREO STORE WINDOW - Simon's Electronics. ON TV - Broadcasting a news report. Weather alert. Black clouds brew over head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Scientists are calling it the fiercest storm of the new millennium, with Dopler Radar readings coming in off the charts. Authorities are imposing a curfew to avoid possible civilian harm. Stay tuned for more in minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FURTHER DOWN THE STREET - We see Winters Tower and the darkest clouds of all beginning to collect overhead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 90 Winters stands with Four Generals in his office, overseei the portal. Ready.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 91 Karai walks down the center path of the garden, flanked b DOZEN FOOT NINJA. She motions for them to take position.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As ordered - no one gets in. No one interferes. No one bears witness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SUDDENLY - the security alarm from the front gate BUZZES. Karai waits a beat. It buzzes again. She walks to the SECURITY PANEL by the front gate. N MONITOR - We see CASEY standing there, obscured by a LA WOODEN CRATE IN FRONT OF HIM. Karai coldly opens the gate

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: May I help you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, hey, I was supposed   to drop this off for Mr. Winters.   If I don't get this done, I am   majorly in the doghouse. You know   what I'm sayin', right? Right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The two stare at each other as the CAM ANGLES BEHIND KARA she's holding a KATANA SWORD behind her back! AM DOLLIES OVERHEAD as we see that Casey is packing MAJOR sports gear "heat" on his end too. Both don't let on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please come in, then.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Really!? (beat - gets composed) I mean, "but of course".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Casey wheels the crate inside. The gate closes only KARAI NOW DISAPPEARED! Casey opens the front hatch, revealing D Raph, Mikey, April and Splinter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's NEVER do this again. (waves hand in front of nose, glares at MIkey) And who did that?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?! Why does everyone always call ME out?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A long beat. Then...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I apologize my sons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone looks at sheepish Splinter. A beat. Suddenly- WIDER - The empty garden begins to move. CREEPY, as DOZEN FOOT NINJA begin to rise out of the shadows and slink tow our heroes, surrounding them. KARAI makes a dramatic entrance, landing in front of Apri and Casey. Tense beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I suppose this is where we all take out our sharp and pointy things?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You suppose correctly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON HEROES - As they all draw their weapons. HIGH ANGLE as Foot all draw theirs. Stand-off. Raph twirls his sais.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am SO gonna enjoy this...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winters walks along all the cells - a final check. He examines one of the cells. PUSH IN - it's LEO. He's slowly waking up - groggy. Mutte incoherently. He PASSES OUT AGAIN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We finally get to see how much of an ass-kicker Master Splinter is. Same with April, who squares off against Kar They fight hard. April ends up cornered, about to be skew by her blade when... -CLUNK! She wobbles and then passes out. When Karai falls of frame, she reveals CASEY JONES a hundred yards behind holding his HOCKEY STICK! April frowns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I had the situation under control.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're welcome.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mikey fights the most like Jackie Chan - comical maneuver backed by solid-hitting blows. Don uses his bo-staff in 1 different ways, both offensively and defensively. Casey is enjoying the hell out of it. High flying, adrena rush. He even catches April checking him out, and vice ve April suddenly spots an opening to the front doors!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guys! Front door is open. Now!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They all charge the front door!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 94 Winters is happy. He looks up to the heavens. Checks a ti piece. Winters begins chanting ANCIENT MAGICK/SPELLS. Loo up through the opening in the middle of the building.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: YESSSSSSS!!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cam PULLS UP through the building. Up over NYC. Throu the clouds... and into space until we pass all ALIGNED ST

dialogues.text: PACE - The final star drifts into position. A LIGHT BURST EFFECT travels down each star, headed to Earth. BACK IN LOBBY - The light burst flies into the lobby and the circle in the middle of all the monsters' cells. ON CIRCLE - The pieces suddenly start to move around. Alm like a sliding puzzle. Then they start to randomly SINK further into the ground. Light pours out of them, until a of them give way to create THE PORTAL. POV OFFICE ABOVE - Each of the Thirteen Cells LIGHT UP to acknowledge their contents. 1... 2... 3...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finally... finally!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON GENERALS - they're still. Emotionless. The light sequence gets to Leo's cell... it doesn't light

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His mind reels. Looks down at the cells. Nothing. Then it hits him like a ton of bricks. He turns to the Generals..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What did you do?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our six Heroes all tear into the lobby. They turn back, a army of ninjas closing in on them!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do we do, dudes?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm working on it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raph grips his sais with renewed strength. Casey looks around, putting things together mentally. Tension builds!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We get ready for round two.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON CASEY IN CORNER - He reaches into his back, takes out hockey stick and - SMASH!!! - kills a LOBBY VASE. Suddenl sirens blare as the OUTSIDE BUILDING SECURITY SHUTTERS SL DOWN just like in Act I! The Ninjas are locked out!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone high fives Casey. Except April. She smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nice work, Jones.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have my moments...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OFF DON'S LOOK - the mayhem builds at the other end of th vast lobby. The cells are glowing. The portal worsens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And that would be the swirling vortex to another world, I assume. (BEAT) Cool.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They all run over. Mikey runs to a cell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leo! Is that you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RAARRGH! - A claw swoops out. He dodges out of the way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guess that would be a "no".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON RAPH - He finds Leo!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Out of the way, please.

dialogues.speaker: D
dialogues.text: on places a small EXPLOSIVE on a key lock. Raph pulls Leo out. LIFELESS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey buddy! Come on, man. Leo, please wake up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raph holds Leo in his lap on the floor. Looks like Leo is DEAD. Raph's head falls low, as...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wh-wh-what took you s-so long?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WIDER - Leo is alive. Coughs and slowly gets his strength back. Stands up. He and Raph look at each other. Leo can imagine what Raph's been through to rescue him. A beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen, I - I'm sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leo forgives him. Moment is suddenly broken by an OS

dialogues.speaker: SMASH
dialogues.text: ANGLE UP - As WINTERS is thrown out the window of his elevator office! He heads straight for a sword wielding BRONZE STATUE... particularly the sword part. Closer... closer... and... ..just misses it. WHUMP! He crashes onto the floor. MOTIONLESS. ON GROUP - They just stare at him. Back up to the office, nearly 150 feet above them. ON BALCONY ABOVE - Aguila looks down. Snarls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winters' body still lays on the floor. This is bad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is he... is he dead?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mikey takes out a hockey stick from Casey's bag and pokes Winters' limp body. Nothing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yup. He's WAY dead, dude.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WINTERS GASPS FOR AIR! Startles everyone in the room. ON EVERYONE - Their faces all drop as Winters stands up i his mini-crater, brushes himself off and is perfectly fin Winters' mind is racing a mile a minute. Doesn't even not those around him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raph can't take it any more. He draws his sais and thrust them at Winters. THAT gets his attention. Winters looks u awe at seeing the mutated freaks in front of him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fascinating...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mister Winters. We mean you no harm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No harm?! Whatever! I'm about to give you piercin's in places you never imagined if you don't tell us what's going on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We were so close... so close.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winters collapses on the floor. Head in hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This was our chance. We could have changed it all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We know everything Max. We know you're trying to recreate what Yaotl started 3000 years ago.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: N WINTERS - He looks up. Sees April. Exhausted, as we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 97 The same red-tinted battlefield we left in Winter's flashback. Monsters are leaping through the hoards.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There are things, Miss O'Neil, no one could possibly know...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Camera pushes in on YAOTL and his Four Generals high on a hill, surveying the action. ON YAOTL - He takes off his helmet... IT'S WINTERS HIMSEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was I who stood on that battlefield all those years ago.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winters/Yaotl looks out at the death and destruction. He looks shocked, surprised. A SHADOW falls over Winters body. He looks up - it's a ceremonial SHAMAN from their enemies' camp.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And we had to pay a price.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Shaman makes hand gestures, chanting. Winters is pull up in the air, and in a crackle of red electricity, we se him become... grayer. N GENERALS - Same electricity. Different effect. They scream, slowly turned into STONE. Cracks form on their bodies, light shooting out of it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We were cursed that day. My four comrades-in-arms were turned into stone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WINTERS(cont'd) Cursed to live on this Earth... immobile... yet fully aware at all times to ponder the crimes we've committed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON WINTERS - He stands on the battlefield. Alone. As he walks, the CAM MOVES around him. During this, we X-DISSOL BETWEEN A FEW SELECT TIME PERIODS between then and now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My curse was to live... forever. To feel the pain of losing love time and time again. Of boredom. The pain... of time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ACK IN PRESENT DAY. Winters stops walking...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We were doomed to live this way until, as the Shaman put it, "you corrected the mistakes of your past". (gestures to the lobby) That's what this is about. Penance, Miss O'Neil. Finally getting a chance to right our wrongs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our master fails to include crucial points in his tale.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON SHADOWS - The Four Generals thump forward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He fails to discuss the petrified agony of three thousand years.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of the torture of taking CENTURIES to merely blink an eye!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of watching the erosion of your own body throughout centuries.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, while our great leader basked in the warmth of the sun and the glory of fresh air... we rotted in the stone hell that lasted throughout Wmillennia.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My brothers, I-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WE ARE NO BROTHERS TO YOU! Our brotherhood was broken the day that you condemned us to this eternity.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON DOORS - CAM PULLS BACK ALONG DOORS as each one is bare forced open and dozens of Foot Ninjas pile in the lobby! Karai comes to FG of group. Surveys as the scene continue

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And now, our Master has tired of feeding on the nectar of life. Of loving his entire life. Of FEELING. (gestures to portal) So he prefers to end it all. End HIS "misery" at the expense of ours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aguila walks to the cells. The portal writhes in the bg, sinking into the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But thanks to his cunning, his technology, we are now capable of LIVING... we have now become- (close, creepy) - gods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And we shall finish what we began all those years ago. We will finally have our victory.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Even with one monster still free, the curse can never be broken!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Winters) Join us. Join us Yaotl, and live a life eternal with us at your side!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON WINTERS - He waits. A beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Never. This was our opportunity! We were wrong! Don't you understand?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NO! YOU WERE WRONG. BEAT) And you are weak.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Karai) Destroy them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Karai sees Winters' condition. Clearly getting screwed by very beings who have been nothing but hostile toward her her Foot Clan. She suddenly GESTURES WITH HER HANDS - military/ninja style.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What does THAT mean?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It means we're going to help you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WIDER - 40 Foot Ninja disperse around out of the building leaving Karai and 4 Foot Ninja behind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My soldiers will find the thirteenth monster. And you will bring it back here. Hurry - we don't have much time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Karai runs off. April looks over at Winters. He nods, sti hurting. April takes off after Karai, leaving Casey behin with the Four Foot. They run out into the garden, just in time to see the other Foot disappear into the night.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I got shotgun!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BACK ON GENERALS - They move toward Winters! The Turtles quickly look at one another. Know what they have to do. They all leap in the way, standing between Winters and hi backstabbing Generals. Aguila moves forward to Leo. Raph steps in beside him, defiant. Then Mikey. Then Don.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you mess with one of us- (looks around) -you mess with all of us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aguila smiles at their chutzpa.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Challenge accepted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 97   The Portal worsens behind them. Sound and sight. The are ready to fight. ...and the fight BEGINS! The Turtles leap, pounce and str with all the exuberance and intensity they've ever had. Winters moves to help the Turtles. Suddenly a WALKING STICK across his chest stops him!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They must face them alone. As brothers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winters debates it in his head for a beat - WHAM! - a tentacle from the portal slams down next to him!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright. We have more important things to do!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON PORTAL - A small DEMON makes its way out of the portal Winters runs and flips through the air and then CLOBBERS with his bare hands, sending it back down! He lands on the other side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Help me push the cells into the portal!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Splinter does as the two masters also manage to lay some smackdown on any emerging creature out of the portal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This has got to be the suckiest vehicle to save the world with.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - as the Cowabunga Carl van roars around the corner. Tink musical notes chime along with the speed. Appropriately l and embarrassing. INSIDE VAN - Casey drives, as April, Karai and Four Foot crammed in the back. Awkward silence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So... anybody from out of town?

dialogues.speaker: AND CASEY/APRIL MONSTER CHASE...
dialogues.text: LOBBY - The combatants all pair off for their final battl Utter commotion. Mikey is paired with Serpiente. Donnie is paired with the General Mono. He uses his quick speed and expert staff against the hammer-weilding Statue Leo fights with Gato. He can't dodge him. He's too fast. lands a lucky blow, but Gato recoils - BOOM! Leo's knocke shell-first into a large GLASS DISPLAY CASE filled with swords and bladed weapons of all kinds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come to daddy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MOMENTS LATER - SMASH! - Leo steps out, ready for action. Strapped with a dozen swords tucked all over his body. He pulls them out randomly as needed throughout the fight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raph and Aguila duke it out in and around the MONSTER CEL It's a Jackie Chan-inspired sequence, where they have to aware of their environment to avoid defeat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sensei! How you guys doing?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON SPLINTER AND WINTERS - The portal is pulling the cells About five more to go. Splinter also flips around and tak out another demon trying to escape. Splinter actually see to be having FUN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wonderful, my son. WONDERFUL!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BACK WITH APRIL AND CASEY - Rush the streets of NYC.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My troops have located the final monster. At the harbor docks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, I got this one covered.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Casey GUNS IT for the pier, music tinkling. CAM ZOOMS AHE THROUGH THE STREETS until it reaches the pier. CAM CRANES over the harbor warehouses until we see - - the 13th monster! Looks like a land-locked GIANT CROCOD It appears unconscious - a hundred or so TRANQ DARTS stic out of it's back. The Van pulls onto the scene.

dialogues.speaker: I
dialogues.text: NSIDE THE VAN - Everyone is in shock. The ninjas look at each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Huh. Now there's somethin' you don't see every day...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They pile out of the van.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (off of monster) Well, I guess we have to figure out how to get handsome here back to Winters' Tower.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We should tie it to the van and drag it back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow. You're... hard core.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON CREATURE - A Foot Ninja stands next to the lifeless bo As he turns his head he doesn't see THE CREATURE'S EYE OP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WIDER - The creature stands up as everyone turns to see. creature DOG SHAKES his hide, sending the tranq darts fly everywhere! They slam into the walls like shrapnel. ON FOOT - As they dive out of the way. One gets hit with dart in the chest. Looks down. Passes out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Incoming!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON VAN - As they open the doors to act as shields as - TH THUNK THUNK - darts stick in the door! ON CREATURE - He's now standing... and dying to chase something. It GROWLS/SCREAMS as they all pile into the va Casey immediately throws it in reverse and starts peeling back on the pier, barely staying out of the clutches of t creature smashing the pier in front of them. Get to the e and spin the vehicle around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FAST! GO FAST NOW!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Casey guns it, the 12-foot creature mere inches away! STARS IN SKY - Karai sees the stars are slowly moving out alignment. Losing time fast. BACK IN LOBBY - CRANE DOWN on Winters and Splinter. On th last full cell. ON PORTAL - A pair of LARGE EYES are threatening to come In the BG, dozens of winged DEMONS fly around inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They better hurry with that last monster!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sure my man Casey's got it all under control...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's what I'm afraid of.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BACK WITH VAN - CLOSE ON CASEY'S FACE - As he's screaming guts out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I GOTTA TELL YA... I'M, UH, I'M STILL NOT SURE THAT THIS WAS THE BEST IDEA!!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WIDER - We see that he's on top of the Van, acting as LIV BAIT to attract the creature! It's working too! The creat pounces along like an awkward greyhound run. April drives

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Casey is throwing SPORTS EQUIPMENT at it from his large hockey bag. The creature is catching and eating it all. INSIDE VAN - Casey slips in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing in here?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ran outta food.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They all look out the back window as the creature pounds closer and closer... BACK IN LOBBY - The Turtles and Generals are at a standst Turtles all get thrown into a pile between the Generals.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen. I'm the last guy to sound like a TV cartoon, but I think we need to work together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Teamwork. The more you know...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don clocks Mikey behind the head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (TEASING) Why Raph, no solo act tonight?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raph grins. They stand, backs to back... finally as a TEA They trust one another, and their efficiency shows. ON PORTAL - More tentacles begin to come out. More claws surround the surface edges. ON TMNT - The music swells. The brothers act and think as one. The way they should. They way they will from now on. ON SPLINTER - As cam PUSHES IN, he stands up. Seeing his sons. As one. As BROTHERS. He smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. Yes, my sons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Generals can't keep up. It's enough to distract them make mistakes the TMNT take advantage of. ON WINTERS - Sees the portal light beginning to SHRINK! Because of the TMNT's moves, the Generals are now on the precipice of the Portal, being pulled back. They struggle stand. The brothers look at each other. The place is violent wit whirlwind and screaming Monsters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So who wants ta call it a day?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Affirmative.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roger dodger, dude.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The   TMNT launch into their FINAL ATTACK - perfectly in and   take out each of the Generals, knocking them back i the   PORTAL! They're plucked out of mid-air by cloudy te and   pulled back! The Turtles collapse onto the floor, back to the portal. Silent. Splinter runs over to them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My sons, I am so proud of you all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then - BOOM! - the Generals' ARMS slam onto the ridge of portal - BEGINNING TO CLIMB OUT! The Turtles jump back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WAAAHHHHH/OHMIGOD!/WHOOAAA!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Silly children. We are immortals made of stone! The Earth has only BEGUN to feel our wrath!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The brothers are screwed. They can't stop the Generals. U BEHIND TURTLES - Glowing headlights grow larger. Closer. KERSMASH!!! The Van flies through the lobby, musical chim and all, being trailed by the Creature! April clips a cor as the vehicle spins out of the path. he Creature tries to stop, but can't on the marble floor. falls, sliding, clicking its claws trying to stop!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LOOK OUT!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winters dives in and pushes the Turtles out of way as the Creature flies in and knocks the Generals back into the Portal! The Cloud Tendrils grab a hold of it and pull it into the Portal! ON STARS - The Stars move out of alignment, ending the cy ON PORTAL - It begins to close. The Generals struggle to out, only now, we see they are HUMAN... their curse broke and an eternity of pain and suffering ahead of them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aguila tries to fight his way out of the portal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: YOU CANNOT DEFEAT US! WE-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHAM! - Raph and Leo team-roundhouse him back into oblivi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought he'd never shut up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WIDER - The portal EXPLODES in a upwards funnel. Silence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HOLY CRAP!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WE DID IT!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: YEAH! WHOOHOO! WE DID IT!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The brothers high five one another. Splinter smiles proud ON VAN - Dusty and smoking. The door clangs open. Casey p out. Karai comes next and accidentally FALLS on Casey in very compromising position! She slyly smiles. April falls last beside them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (caught - looks at both) Oh. I, uh -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HUHN! - Casey tosses Karai off of him. April's eye cocks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't try to tell me for one second that you didn't enjoy tha-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Casey just grabs her, cutting her off and they kiss. Like they should have been kissing all along. They stop. Noses close. Smile. They pull apart, revealing MIKEY standing there. Watching them all gooey-eyed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AWWWWWW....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raph and Leo look at each other. A beat. Then hug. Brothe again. Dialogue would just ruin this moment. Splinter walks over to them. CAM ADJUSTS to show Karai an the Foot Ninja standing there. Silence. Finally, Karai st forward -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are every bit the warriors I was informed you were. You have passed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON TMNT - they're confused.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Passed what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know us?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've known OF you for some time. (beat, to Leo's question) Savor your victory tonight. For soon we will have further business together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What kind of business?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The kind that involves familiar faces from your past...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON TURTLES - They all look at each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She doesn't mean...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They look back - and see Karai and the Foot have DISAPPEA Raph looks over at WINTERS. He's hunched over in the corn Can't tell what's going on. They walk over slowly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winters?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON WINTERS - Looks like he's sobbing. They get concerned. Then the sobs turn to LAUGHING. He stands up. His hand is spotted red with his M own BLOOD from a cut on his cheek.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm never usually that happy to be bleeding.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You would be if you were an immortal who couldn't bleed for three thousand years...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winters looks at all the Turtles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you. Thank you from the bottom of my heart. You've made a very old man, very very happy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, um, what happens now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON WINTERS - He just SMILES. Content. Finally at peace. A ages thousands of years in front of us... eventually turn to DUST and blowing away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay... just a little bit creepy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh gawd. I think he's in my n-n- ATTCHOOOOO!! OH GROSS!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CAM PULLS BACK, out of the building, onto the street. See destruction. The clearing skies. THE SUNRISE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 99 Raph comes to Splinter's room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You wanted to see me Sensei?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sit down, Raphael.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you, Master Splinter, for your guidance. (thinks, humble) I can only hope that one day, I will be able to begin the next stage of my training like Leo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Splinter smiles. Reaches into a box and takes out a simil MEDALLION to the one given to Leonardo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That, my son, you already have.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our training works in mysterious ways. But the answer that lies in all our questions... is family.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raph beams as he accepts the "badge". He excitedly stands Splinter looks to the hallway where his eyes meet Leo's. exchange knowing smiles as Splinter winks and we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 100 A ROCKIN' NUMBER PLAYS as we cap everyone's adventures. Splinter walks through the lair. It's empty. He walks pas their "trophy room". He places the ornate head of WINTERS CANE on the shelf.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He sits down to meditate. But first reaches into his robe pulls out a TIN FOIL PACKAGE. He opens it up and smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ahh. Double chocolate fudge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mikey and Don are on the rooftops. Leo and Raph join them top. Leo and Raph have an aside to themselves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So we're cool with the whole Nightwatcher thing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, we're cool. Our secret, bro. (checks for clear coast) You got rid of the stuff, right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: QUICK SHOT - Nightwatcher's gear burning in a barrel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about the bike, tho?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (discreet/confessional) Okay, so I couldn't exactly destroy the bike.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's just say it's in good hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you mean?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I mean, it's in good hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (thinks, then realizes) Oh, you didn't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raph sheepishly shrugs as we-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHAAAAAAAAAHOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Casey roars down the street on the black motorcycle of Nightwatcher, barely able to hang on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He drives past WINTERS TOWER - now being converted to a NATURAL SCIENCES AND HISTORY MUSEUM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A HITCHHIKER THUMB comes into frame. Casey stops his bike WIDER - It's April. She smiles. Casey hands her a helmet. APRIL'S POV INSIDE HELMET - We see a small DIAMOND RING t to the visor. She takes it off. Beaming. Models it on her hand. She leans forward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She wraps her arms around his waist and holds tight for t adventures that await... CAM FOLLOWS for a beat, then rises up the buildings to-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 104 All four turtles are horsing around. They get geared up.. and head off for a game of NINJA TAG. The boys run, hoot and holler as they fly high on the rooftops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So what makes a family? Personally, it's more than sharing a roof or a bathroom. It's sharing life... My father taught me that, and I think it's pretty much true... y'know, provided that you don't kill each other in the process. Or that no one touches your stuff. Or makes loud noises when you're trying to sleep. Or...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They run close to the camera, once again, a family.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, nobody said it was easy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And as RAPHAEL and LEONARDO leap toward camera, we-
